snippet: Martin Skrtel scored his seventh Premier League own goal as struggling Newcastle upset Liverpool, 2-0, on Sunday.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Newcastle United defeats Liverpool, 2-0; other soccer matches and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Martin Skrtel scored his seventh Premier League own goal as struggling Newcastle upset Liverpool, 2-0, on Sunday.

headline.main: Unhappy Trip to Newcastle for Liverpool’s New Coach
headline.print_headline: Unhappy Trip to Newcastle for Liverpool’s New Coach
